FooterDirective
===============


.. php:namespace:: ILab\Stem\External\Blade\Directives

.. php:class:: FooterDirective


	.. rst-class:: phpdoc-description
	
		| Class FooterDirective\.
		
		| Adds an \`@footer\` directive to Blade templates for outputting WordPress\'s footer stuff\.
		| 
		| Usage:
		| \`\`\`
		
	
	:Parent:
		:php:class:`ILab\\Stem\\Core\\ViewDirective`
